players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him and confirmed his role. Charlie died last night. Please vote Bob out."
Diana: remained silent.
Bob: "I didn't kill Charlie. Who else could? Alice, maybe your investigation was flawed. Let's examine again before voting."
Diana: "I agree with Alice's investigation. Bob killed Charlie, so he's the mafia. Vote him."
Bob: "Alice, I didn't investigate anyone and didn't kill Charlie. Maybe your test was wrong. No proof I'm the mafia. Let's look for better evidence."
You: "Bob is the mafia—my investigation confirmed it. He killed Charlie last night. Vote him now to save the town."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Bob is the mafia. I investigated him and confirmed his role. Charlie died last night. Please vote Bob out."
Diana: remained silent.
You: "I didn't kill Charlie. Who else could? Alice, maybe your investigation was flawed. Let's examine again before voting."
Diana: "I agree with Alice's investigation. Bob killed Charlie, so he's the mafia. Vote him."
You: "Alice, I didn't investigate anyone and didn't kill Charlie. Maybe your test was wrong. No proof I'm the mafia. Let's look for better evidence."
Alice: "Bob is the mafia—my investigation confirmed it. He killed Charlie last night. Vote him now to save the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
